name: ALG | Specialists in Talent
description: Founded in 2004, ALG is an industry leading talent solutions specialist that offers a full range of recruitment and training services. Our recruitment services are tailored for contract, project support, outsourcing and permanent and executive positions covering industries such as aviation, IT, engineering, advanced manufacturing and pharmaceuticals. ALG is a specialist recruitment company focused on providing staffing solutions across technical industries such as aviation, IT, engineering and defence. To help upskill and source the right candidates ALG also offers psychometric testing and training to support your business needs.
features: Fully accredited AS/NZS ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System
Recruitment certified consultants, account managers and workforce planners
Network of over 75,000 highly skilled professionals
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Bringing top talent to your organisation.
ShortDescription: ALG is a specialist recruitment company focused on providing staffing solutions across technical industries

Highlights.name: Outsourcing
Highlights.description: ALG can provide business process outsourcing and payroll services.

Highlights.name: Psychometric Testing
Highlights.description: ALG can process psychometric testing for all candidates at any level of operation.

Highlights.name: Training
Highlights.description: ALG can ensure your candidates are upskilled for technical roles.

enhanced_description: Founded in 2004, ALG is an industry-leading talent solutions specialist providing a full range of recruitment and training services. Their recruitment services encompass contract, project support, outsourcing, and permanent and executive positions, primarily focusing on technical industries such as aviation, IT, engineering, advanced manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, and defence. To further support businesses in sourcing and upskilling candidates, ALG offers psychometric testing and comprehensive training services. Additionally, ALG provides business process outsourcing and payroll services, aiming to bring top talent to organizations.
key_use_cases: Providing staffing solutions across technical industries
